## ๐ก ูุซุงูโูุง ุขููุฒุด

### ๐น ูุซุงู ฑ โ ุญุฑฺฉุช ุขููฺฏ ุณุงุฏู

```python
from manim import *
from manim_fa_physics import *

class PendulumDemo(SpaceScene):
    def construct(self):
        pend = Pendulum(length=3, initial_theta=0.4)
        self.add(pend)
        self.make_rigid_body(*pend.bobs)
        pend.start_swinging()
        self.add(TracedPath(pend.bobs[-1].get_center, stroke_color=BLUE))
        self.wait(5)

        
```

### ๐น ูุซุงู ฒ โ ุงูุชุดุงุฑ ููุฑ ุฏุฑ ุนุฏุณโูุง ูุงฺฏุฑุง 
```python
from manim import *
from manim_fa_physics import *
from manim_fa import FaText

class ConcaveLensExampleDynamic(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        # ุณุงุฎุช ุนุฏุณ ูุงฺฏุฑุง
        lens = Lens(-4, 1, fill_opacity=0.4, color=BLUE).shift(RIGHT)
        self.play(FadeIn(lens))

        # ุชุนุฑู ูพุฑุชููุง
        rays = [
            Ray(LEFT * 4 + UP * i, RIGHT, 8, [lens], color=YELLOW)
            for i in [0.6, 0.2, -0.2, -0.6]
        ]

        # ููุงุด ุชุฏุฑุฌ ูพุฑุชููุง
        for ray in rays:
            self.play(Create(ray), run_time=1.2)
            self.wait(0.2)

        # ููุงุด ูุชู ูุงุฑุณ ุจุง ูููุช IRLotus
        text = FaText(
            "ุนุจูุฑ ูพุฑุชููุง ููุฑ ุงุฒ ุนุฏุณ ูุงฺฏุฑุง",
            font="IRLotus",
            font_size=36
        )

        text.to_corner(UL)  # ฺฏูุดูโ ุจุงูุง ฺูพ
        text.shift(RIGHT * 2 + DOWN * 2)

        # ุงููุดู ููุดุชู ูุชู
        self.play(Write(text))
        self.wait(2)

```

### ๐น ูุซุงู ณ โ ุชุบุฑุงุช ูุฏุงู ุงูฺฉุชุฑฺฉ ุจุงุฑูุง
```python
from manim import *
from manim_fa_physics import *


class DynamicElectricFieldSceneII(Scene):
    

    def construct(self):
        # ุชุนุฑู ุฏู ุจุงุฑ ุซุงุจุช ููู ุฏุฑ ุฏู ุทุฑู ุตุญูู
        neg_left = Charge(-1, LEFT * 3 + DOWN)
        neg_right = Charge(-1, RIGHT * 3 + DOWN)

        # ุชุนุฑู ฺฉ ุจุงุฑ ูุซุจุช ูุชุญุฑฺฉ
        pos_charge = Charge(2, ORIGIN + UP * 0.5)

        # ุงุฌุงุฏ ูุฏุงู ุงูฺฉุชุฑฺฉ ุงููู ุจุฑ ุงุณุงุณ ูููุนุช ูุนู ุจุงุฑูุง
        field = ElectricField(neg_left, neg_right, pos_charge)

        # ุงูุฒูุฏู ุงุฌุฒุง ุตุญูู
        self.add(neg_left, neg_right, pos_charge, field)

        # ุชุงุจุน ุจูโุฑูุฒุฑุณุงู ูุฏุงู ุจุฑุง ูุฑ ูุฑู
        def update_field(field_obj):
            field_obj.become(ElectricField(neg_left, neg_right, pos_charge))

        field.add_updater(lambda f: update_field(f))

        # ูพูุงููุง ุญุฑฺฉุช ุจุงุฑ ูุซุจุช
        self.play(
            pos_charge.animate.shift(RIGHT * 4),
            run_time=5,
            rate_func=there_and_back,
        )

        # ุชููู ุขูพุฏุช ูุฏุงู ู ูพุงุงู
        field.remove_updater(lambda f: update_field(f))
        self.wait(2)

```
